SEARCH
Package com.example.cab302project.models

Class SqliteUserDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab302project.models.SqliteUserDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserDAO
public class SqliteUserDAO extends Object implements IUserDAO
SQlite implementation of IUserDAO This class handles all operations and methods for users, friend request and events Using sthe connection from SqliteConnection this maanges table creation and methods for user management friend request handling, event storage and handling

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SqliteUserDAO()
    Grabs the Sqliteconnection and ensures the necessary tables are created
